author: Joseph Young
title: U.S. Futures Rise as ‘Mad Men’ Cigarette Giant Attempts Coronavirus Cure
description: British American Tobacco is hopeful it can create a coronavirus vaccine by June. U.S. stock market futures is up 1.1% in pre-market trading. The post U.S. Futures Rise as ‘Mad Men’ Cigarette Giant Attempts Coronavirus Cure appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• The U.S. stock market futures is up 1.7% as British American Tobacco is hopeful for a vaccine by June.
  • Dr. Anthony Fauci has said he expects 12 to 18 months for a coronavirus vaccine to be distributed to the public.
